description: - NewCompact Battery Pack- High quality, low cost battery pack reduces the recycling time between flashes to a third of the original time as well as increasing the number of flashes three fold. The pack has a tripod screw so that it can be screwed into the tripod thread of the camera.- The battery pack is dust and weather protected and uses 8 AA batteries. This external power source is designed for use with CANON 600EX 580EX II, 580EX, 550EX, MR-14EX, MT-24EX and Yongnuo 560 II 560 III 565EX flash.- This is a great addition to any professional or amateur photographer’s camera kit. Ideal for special event photography, such as weddings and birthday celebrations- New generic lens cleaning pen- Color: Black- Safe for all lenses including multi-coated surfaces- The small, pen-style design easily fits in any camera bag.- The soft brush retracts into the pen body to stay clean. Use the brush to dust off any particles and debris.- Hidden in the other end is a soft pad with a non-liquid cleaning agent to remove fingerprints and more serious dirt, all without damaging the anti-reflection coating on your lens.- The soft pad contains a unique non-liquid cleaning compound that won’t spill or dry out.- Use it for lenses on cameras, camcorders, binoculars, telescopes, microscopes, rifle scopes, night vision, and more!- New5 Premium MagicFiber Microfiber Cleaning Cloth- Ultra gentle! Extremely fine microfiber leaves zero scratches, streaks or marks. Safe for all lenses.- Clean without the need of soaps or detergents. Wipe down kids' toys, cribs, stainless steel counters and other areas you want to keep chemical free.- Great value for your money. Reusable and long lasting.- Size: 6 x 7 inches (15cm x 18cm)- Each microfiber is individually and neatly packed in it's own polyurethane plastic bag for long term safekeeping.
title: External Flash Battery Pack for CANON Speedlite (580EX II, 580EX, 550EX), Macro Ring Lite MR-14EX and Macro Twin Lite MT-24EX Flashes with Lens Cleaning Pen and 5 Premium MagicFiber Microfiber Cleaning Cloths
